text:
- Amazon MGM Studios is a
premier entertainment company

that produces content,
distributes it all over the world.

Our infrastructure
engineering team develops
a lot of AWS-based capabilities.

We support development of
the cloud infrastructure
and the media supply chain.
We need to understand exactly
how resources relate to one another,
specifically, in an architecture diagram.

Understanding what you
have without a diagram
is like flying with no map.

Whether it's compute, whether
it's networking, appliances,

we needed to understand
exactly what we have running,
and discover that automatically
and provide that as an output.
With Workload Discovery on AWS,
my team is able to deploy the solution
across all of our organization.

Once it's deployed, it's able
to discover all of the assets,
all of the resources that we have running
in our environment.

And then what it does is
generates an architectural diagram
that provides us with documentation

to understand exactly where
everything is running,

whether it be in one
region or multi-region.
Using Workload Discovery on AWS
is actually very straightforward.

When we looked at the
audit discovery time,
we saved about 50%,

which allowed us to reduce
the toil that we had
and allowed us to focus on other projects.
(upbeat music)
